org.hps.detector.svt

Class SvtDetectorSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.detector.svt.SvtDetectorSetup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ConditionsListener

    public final class SvtDetectorSetup
extends Object
implements ConditionsListener
    This class puts SvtConditions data onto HpsSiSensor objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean enabled
      Flag to enable/disable this class from within conditions manager.

      Initialize logger.
      private static int NOISE_COUNT
      The number of noise samples.
      private static int PEDESTAL_COUNT
      The number of pedestals.
      private String svtName
      The name of the SVT subdetector in the detector model.
